Proudly Made in the USA and Designed With Shatterproof Mirror Materials, This Over the Door Mirror or Wall Mounted Mirror Has Been Designed to Be Durable and Can Easily Be Used With the Door Opened or Closed

body.description: Mirrotek has created a unique and elegant series of full length shatterproof mirrors. Designed with simplicity and precision, each mirror is designed to provide you with a full length body view. The Over the Door Mirror has been designed with dimensions of 48” x 14” x 1.5” and a total weight of 7.5 lbs., making it lightweight and easy to hang. With no assembly required upon delivery, you can instantly hang this mirror on your bedroom door and enjoy the view. Crafted from shatterproof mirror materials, this over the door mirror is an optical quality full length body mirror. Mirrotek has been created quality dressing mirrors, accessories, clocks, gifts and more since 1942. With a passion for innovation and creativity, Mirrotek creates practical and quality home additions. Dedicated to customer satisfaction, Mirrotek strives for customer satisfaction. Enjoy the quality and practical home solutions created by Mirrotek and make a lasting impression in your home for years to come. Made in the USA

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Mirrotek Over the Door Full Length Dressing Mirror Product Details Color: Cherry 14 x 1.5 x 48 inches No Assembly Required Easily Hang on Any Door Or Closet Weight: 7.5 LBS Full Length Optical Mirror Designed in The USA Product Uses Configure and customize your Full length mirror without any tools. Just remove from the box and hang on any closet or door. Relieve yourself of the common frustrations of getting ready to go out. Easy to install right out of the box and available in many colors and finishes to fit your style. A Stunning Focal Point for Any Decor The Mirrotek Hanging Full Length Dressing Mirror Wouldn't it be convenient to have a full length mirror in any closet or door needed. Well with the Mirrotek full length mirror you can. Available in many different colors and finishes to customize to your own sense of style and decor. This easy to install mirror features a slim profile and comes in Eight beautiful wood finishes. It hooks right over the door, so space is no issue. Frustration Free Assembly Installation is extremely easy. It will arrive to your home Fully assembled. All you need to do is customize and configure it for your own routine and demands. With a super slim and functional profile your door can still be opened or closed with ease.

A High Quality Dressing Mirror for Any Style Full Length Dressing Mirror Your mirror comes complete with a full length dressing mirror. No need to run to the nearest mirror to see if everything matches. The full dressing mirror measures a full 48 inch long. The attached hooks offer a comfortable length to match your height during installation. Slim Profile and Endless Design Options Easily attach and detach from closet or door without the use of any tools or leave it on the Super Slim Profile allows you to close the door even with mirror attached and let it become a stunning focal point in your décor. Add a Touch of Style to Any Space Not only is this a great space saver but with no holes needed to drill it is safe for people who rent apartments. All of our mirrors and frames are designed in the USA. Always look your best with our quality Mirrotek full length dressing mirror.

About Mirrotek We offer a vast selection of dressing mirrors, accessories, clocks, gifts and more. A Beauty Mirror For Everything Framed Wall or Door Full Length Mirror This framed wall or door mirror subtly enhances a bedroom or dressing room without taking up a great deal of space. Easily attaches to Standard Doors or Walls with Quality Brackets Mirror Measures 48 inch Slim Profile to fit any closet or door Available in many finishes and styles No tools needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would recommend this
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my daughter for her college apartment. We received it yesterday. It seems to be good quality and the peices fit together easily to hang it on a door. It is a good product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice and Sturdy, also the color

reviews.reviewerName: I'm an American just like you
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mirror so far, packaging was busted.
reviews.reviewText: One of the corners of the packaging was busted open. Fortunately the mirror was undamaged. The actually packaging work was superb. 2 pieces of thick and sturdy wood strips were included in addition to foam corner coverings and foam covers for the mirror.There were some streaks on the mirror, water and microfiber cloths took care of that.the installation was very easy using the hooks. On the back of the frame there are 2 holes each side. Each hook has 4 holes. There are 4 screws for installing. The reason each hook has 4 holes is for height adjustment. Screw in the lower holes, the mirror hangs lower, higher holes, the mirror hangs higher. The difference is maybe about 2 in. I'm 5'4", so I went with lower ones. Works just fine.The mirror is very clear and not much to say about that. The frame is sturdy. Having a full length mirror does help tremendously if you care how look you from head to toe. Makes a great difference in choosing clothing. The lights in my walk-in closet are bright and I felt I was approximating the experience of buying clothes at a store trying on online bought outfits, without having to go to a store, which is pain in the butt for a guy like me.Simple tool for maximum benefit for me, ymmv.Overall: A

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to hang, and no distortion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Item was for my daughters dorm room. Once we moved her in and opened the box, mirror was smashed. We did not open it until we went to put it up because I didn’t want it broken.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2020
reviews.reviewText: The mirror works as advertised. It was easy to assemble and hangs on the door easily. This item should have a "results may vary disclaimer", my daughter seems to know how to use it effectively as she virtually never steps away from it, however, every time I step in front of it I am unhappy with the results. I am still not positive that I am using it correctly, it is possible that it inadvertently adds 15 pounds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Works as advertised and arrived the next day after placing order

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Door Mirror just ok
reviews.reviewText: pros-It is a nice looking mirror and sturdy. Hangs on the door nicely and you are able to close the door. I like the fact that I didn't have to put holes in my walls. I think that if would be great for an apartment, in that you wouldn't have to worry about the holes in the wall to keep your landlord happy. It was well packaged and arrived in good condition.cons: It does move and bang the door when opening and shutting your door. It doesn't move sideways, just back and forth. I feel like after awhile this might cause some problems as in wear and tear. Also, I am waiting to see if it makes marks on my door because of this. I don't know that because I haven't had it that long, it's just an assumption.I probably wouldn't buy again, but overall I give it a 3.

El primer producto me llegó roto y para devolverlo tuve que pagar el flete que me costó 650 pesos y del cuál sólo tuve un reembolso de 40 pesos, aunque el reemplazo sí me llegó al día siguiente que reporté el artículo dañado. Cuando lo instalé me di cuenta que mi puerta es un poco más ancha que la abertura de los ganchos y no se puede cerrar la puerta.
Los ganchos no se ajustaron a mi puerta, es más gruesa que estos, no lo pude colgarEs para puertas más delgadas y solo de esa medida o menos

Me siento estafada. El producto parece usado. Llegó completamente sucio y astillado además de tener químicos dañinos para la salud que no lo mencionan en ningún lado. Lo tiré directamente a la basura, regresarlo hubiera sido también una pérdida de dinero y tiempo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good for inside a closet but not in the open ...
reviews.reviewText: Does the job but kind of cheap looking. Good for inside a closet but not in the open unless you don't care about looks.
